H0.text: Who, at the beginning of 2016, holds the record for most number of weeks in golfing's World Top 10. Tiger Woods

H1.text: Who, at the beginning of 2016, holds the record for most number of weeks in golfing's World Top 10. Phil Mickelson

H2.text: Who, at the beginning of 2016, holds the record for most number of weeks in golfing's World Top 10. Rory McIlroy

H3.text: Who, at the beginning of 2016, holds the record for most number of weeks in golfing's World Top 10. Tont

A4.text: He has been the number one player in the world for the most consecutive weeks and for the greatest total number of weeks of any golfer in history.
